page.title: 07HAYSTON MILL
page.content: Hayston Mill is on the boundary between Rosemarket and Llanstadwell parishes.Until about 1920 people from Rosemarket took their corn there to be ground. It is now used as the business premises of Pembroke Pools and Hayston Mill Woodstoves.These are two companies run by the same man.Most of his summer work is installing and maintaining swimming pools.Most of his winter work is installing and maintaining wood_burning stoves.He employs several people on a part_time basis helping with specific jobs.The owner is the only full_time worker.He travels to most parts of Dyfed in his work.
